channel.title: vincent van gogh on d2h.net: flotsam, jetsam, & lagan
channel.description: Recent content in vincent van gogh on d2h.net: flotsam, jetsam, & lagan

item.title: more vincent stuff…
item.description: looking through drscofield’s twitter messages of the past couple of days i noticed @pixelq’s twitter about “watching the world” and i had to head over to youtube to watch this 3D internet masterpiece once more. IMHO it’s one of the most beautiful pieces of art (and it’s a pity it wasn’t on display in basel recently) — have a look yourself: almost makes you cry… content.

item.title: having a look at vincent’s pictures
item.description: the kunstmuseum in basel is hosting an exhibition of vincent van gogh’s landscape pictures and we had been planning on going up to basel and having a look at them. so, as this sunday had more or less non-stop rain forecast, we had an early sunday breakfast, skipped church, grabbed our rail network cards and hopped on the train from einsiedeln to wädenswil, and changed into the IR train to basel.
